headline: The Hershey Company (HSY): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on The Hershey Company on Value investing subreddit by raytoei. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on HSY. The Hershey Company’s share was trading at $185.08 as of December 1st. HSY’s trailing and forward P/E were 27.67 and 27.70 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Hershey’s stock performance offers a […]

headline: 1 Profitable Stock to Research Further and 2 Facing Headwinds
summary: Not all profitable companies are built to last - some rely on outdated models or unsustainable advantages. Just because a business is in the green today doesn’t mean it will thrive tomorrow.

headline: Mondelez: A Rare Opportunity To Buy This Snack Powerhouse Below Fair Value
summary: Mondelez expects over $3 billion in 2025 free cash flow, despite recent declines from cocoa disruptions and weak consumer demand. Learn more on MDLZ stock here.
